speaker: Mia
text: Lately, I've started considering applying for a senior developer position. Do you think it's worth trying?
ipa: ˈleɪtli | aɪv ˈstɑɹtɪd kənˈsɪdɚɪŋ əˈplaɪɪŋ fɔɹ ə ˈsiːnjɚ dɪˈvɛləpɚ pəˈzɪʃən | dʊ jʊ θɪŋk ɪts wɝθ ˈtɹaɪɪŋ
stress: Lately | I've STARTED CONSIDERING applying for a SENIOR DEVELOPER POSITION | do you think it's WORTH TRYING
linking:
"I've started" → /aɪv ˈstɑɹtɪd/ (v + s linking)
"senior developer" → /ˈsiːnjɚ dɪˈvɛləpɚ/ (r + d linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Definitely. You deserve to take that step. Just prepare to explain your leadership experiences during the interview.
ipa: ˈdɛfənətli | jʊ dɪˈzɝv tə teɪk ðæt stɛp | ʤəst pɹɪˈpɛɹ tə ɪkˈspleɪn jɚ ˈliːdɚʃɪp ɪkˈspɪɹiənsɪz ˈdʊɹɪŋ ði ˈɪntɚˌvju
stress: Definitely | You DESERVE to TAKE that STEP | Just PREPARE to EXPLAIN your LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCES during the INTERVIEW
linking:
"deserve to" → /dɪˈzɝv tə/ (v + t linking)
"prepare to" → /pɹɪˈpɛɹ tə/ (r + t linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Right. I intend to highlight the projects where I led small teams. I also plan to show the apps we launched successfully.
ipa: ɹaɪt | aɪ ɪnˈtɛnd tə ˈhaɪˌlaɪt ðə ˈpɹɑʤɛkts wɛɹ aɪ lɛd smɔl timz | aɪ ˈɔlsoʊ plæn tə ʃoʊ ði æps wi lɔnʧt səkˈsɛsfəli
stress: Right | I INTEND to HIGHLIGHT the PROJECTS where I LED SMALL TEAMS | I also PLAN to SHOW the APPS we LAUNCHED SUCCESSFULLY
linking:
"intend to" → /ɪnˈtɛnd tə/ (d + t linking)
"plan to" → /plæn tə/ (n + t linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Good strategy. You might want to avoid mentioning any failed projects unless you can explain learning from them.
ipa: ɡʊd ˈstɹætəʤi | jʊ maɪt wɑnt tə əˈvɔɪd ˈmɛnʃənɪŋ ˈɛni feɪld ˈpɹɑʤɛkts ənˈlɛs jʊ kən ɪkˈspleɪn ˈlɝnɪŋ frəm ðɛm
stress: Good STRATEGY | You MIGHT want to AVOID MENTIONING any FAILED PROJECTS unless you can EXPLAIN LEARNING from them
linking:
"want to" → /wɑnt tə/ (t + t linking)
"can explain" → /kən ɪkˈspleɪn/ (n + e linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Got it. I'm a bit nervous though. I can't help feeling like I'm not ready sometimes.
ipa: ɡɑt ɪt | aɪm ə bɪt ˈnɝvəs ðoʊ | aɪ kænt hɛlp ˈfilɪŋ laɪk aɪm nɑt ˈɹɛdi ˈsəmˌtaɪmz
stress: Got it | I'm a BIT NERVOUS though | I CAN'T HELP FEELING like I'm NOT READY sometimes
linking:
"can't help" → /kænt hɛlp/ (t + h linking)
"feeling like" → /ˈfilɪŋ laɪk/ (g + l linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: That's normal. But remember, you managed to complete complex projects already. Don't forget to trust yourself.
ipa: ðæts ˈnɔɹməl | bət ɹɪˈmɛmbɚ | jʊ ˈmænɪʤd tə kəmˈplit ˈkɑmplɛks ˈpɹɑʤɛkts ɔlˈɹɛdi | doʊnt fɚˈɡɛt tə tɹʌst jɚˈsɛlf
stress: That's NORMAL | But REMEMBER | You MANAGED to COMPLETE COMPLEX PROJECTS already | Don't FORGET to TRUST yourself
linking:
"managed to" → /ˈmænɪʤd tə/ (d + t linking)
"forget to" → /fɚˈɡɛt tə/ (t + t linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Thanks. Would you mind reviewing my portfolio later?
ipa: θæŋks | wʊd jʊ maɪnd ɹɪˈvjuɪŋ maɪ pɔɹtˈfoʊlioʊ ˈleɪtɚ
stress: Thanks | Would you MIND REVIEWING my PORTFOLIO later
linking:
"would you" → /wʊd jʊ/ (d + y linking)
"mind reviewing" → /maɪnd ɹɪˈvjuɪŋ/ (d + r linking)

speaker: Daniel
text: Of course. I enjoy helping people grow. Plus, you seem to have strong potential.
ipa: əv kɔɹs | aɪ ɪnˈʤɔɪ ˈhɛlpɪŋ ˈpipəl ɡɹoʊ | plʌs | jʊ sim tə hæv stɹɔŋ pəˈtɛnʃəl
stress: Of COURSE | I ENJOY HELPING people GROW | Plus | you SEEM to have STRONG POTENTIAL
linking:
"enjoy helping" → /ɪnˈʤɔɪ ˈhɛlpɪŋ/ (y + h linking)
"seem to" → /sim tə/ (m + t linking)

speaker: Mia
text: Thanks again! I'll carry on updating my documents today and promise to send them to you tomorrow.
ipa: θæŋks əˈɡɛn | aɪl ˈkæɹi ɑn ˈʌpˌdeɪtɪŋ maɪ ˈdɑkjəmənts təˈdeɪ | ənd ˈpɹɑmɪs tə sɛnd ðɛm tə jʊ təˈmɑɹoʊ
stress: Thanks AGAIN | I'll CARRY ON UPDATING my DOCUMENTS today | and PROMISE to SEND them to you TOMORROW
linking:
"carry on" → /ˈkæɹi ɑn/ (y + o linking)
"send them" → /sɛnd ðɛm/ (d + th linking)
